verses.verse: Save <S%H3467><s%> me, <S%H430><s%> God, for the waters <S%H4325><s%> have come <S%H935><s%> up to my neck! <S%H5315><s%>

I sink <S%H2883><s%> in deep <S%H4688><s%> mire, <S%H3121><s%> where there is no foothold. <S%H4613><s%> I have come <S%H935><s%> into deep <S%H4615><s%> waters, <S%H4325><s%> where the floods <S%H7641><s%> overflow me. <S%H7857><s%>
I am weary <S%H3021><s%> with my crying. <S%H7121><s%> My throat <S%H1627><s%> is dry. <S%H2787><s%> My eyes <S%H5869><s%> fail, <S%H3615><s%> looking <S%H3176><s%> for my God. <S%H430><s%>

Those who hate <S%H8130><s%> me without a cause <S%H2600><s%> are more <S%H7231><s%> than the hairs <S%H8185><s%> of my head. <S%H7218><s%> Those who want to cut me off, <S%H6789><s%> being my enemies <S%H341><s%> wrongfully, <S%H8267><s%> are mighty. <S%H6105><s%> I have to restore <S%H7725><s%> what I didn't <S%H1497><s%> take away.
God, <S%H430><s%> you know <S%H3045><s%> my foolishness. <S%H200><s%> My sins <S%H819><s%> aren't <S%H3582><s%> hidden from you.

Don't <S%H6960><s%> let those who wait for you be shamed <S%H954><s%> through me, <S%H136><s%> Lord Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%> Don't <S%H1245><s%> let those who seek you be brought to dishonor <S%H3637><s%> through me, <S%H430><s%> God of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
Because for your sake, <S%H5375><s%> I have borne reproach. <S%H2781><s%> Shame <S%H3639><s%> has covered <S%H3680><s%> my face. <S%H6440><s%>
I have become a stranger <S%H2114><s%> to my brothers, <S%H251><s%> an alien <S%H5237><s%> to my mother <S%H517><s%>'s children. <S%H1121><s%>
For the zeal <S%H7068><s%> of your house <S%H1004><s%> consumes <S%H398><s%> me. <S%H2781><s%> The reproaches of those who reproach <S%H2778><s%> you have fallen on me. <S%H5307><s%>
When I wept <S%H1058><s%> and I <S%H5315><s%> fasted, <S%H6685><s%> that was to my reproach. <S%H2781><s%>
When I made <S%H5414><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> my clothing, <S%H3830><s%> I became a byword to them. <S%H4912><s%>
Those who sit in <S%H3427><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> talk <S%H7878><s%> about me. <S%H5058><s%> I am the song of the drunkards. <S%H8354><s%>

But as for me, <S%H8605><s%> my prayer is to you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, in an acceptable <S%H7522><s%> time. <S%H6256><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> in the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of your loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> me in the truth <S%H571><s%> of your salvation. <S%H3468><s%>

Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me out of the mire, <S%H2916><s%> and don't <S%H2883><s%> let me sink. Let me be delivered <S%H5337><s%> from those who hate <S%H8130><s%> me, <S%H4615><s%> and out of the deep waters. <S%H4325><s%>

Don't <S%H4325><s%> let the flood waters overwhelm <S%H7857><s%> me, <S%H4688><s%> neither let the deep swallow me up. <S%H1104><s%> Don't <S%H875><s%> let the pit shut <S%H332><s%> its mouth on me. <S%H6310><s%>

Answer <S%H6030><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, for your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> is good. <S%H2896><s%> According to the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your tender mercies, <S%H7356><s%> turn to me. <S%H6437><s%>
Don't <S%H5641><s%> hide your face <S%H6440><s%> from your servant, <S%H5650><s%> for I am in distress. <S%H6887><s%> Answer <S%H6030><s%> me speedily! <S%H4118><s%>
Draw near <S%H7126><s%> to my soul, <S%H5315><s%> and redeem <S%H1350><s%> it. <S%H6299><s%> Ransom me because of my enemies. <S%H341><s%>
You know <S%H3045><s%> my reproach, <S%H2781><s%> my shame, <S%H2781><s%> and my dishonor. <S%H1322><s%> My adversaries are all before you. <S%H6887><s%>

Reproach <S%H2781><s%> has broken <S%H7665><s%> my heart, <S%H3820><s%> and I am full of heaviness. <S%H5136><s%> I looked <S%H6960><s%> for some to take pity, <S%H5110><s%> but there was none; <S%H5162><s%> for comforters, but I found none. <S%H4672><s%>
They also gave <S%H5414><s%> me gall <S%H7219><s%> for my food. <S%H1267><s%> In my thirst, <S%H6772><s%> they gave me vinegar <S%H2558><s%> to drink. <S%H8248><s%>
Let their table <S%H7979><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them become a snare. <S%H6341><s%> May it become a retribution <S%H7965><s%> and a trap. <S%H4170><s%>
Let their eyes <S%H5869><s%> be darkened, <S%H2821><s%> so that they can't <S%H7200><s%> see. Let their backs <S%H4975><s%> be continually <S%H8548><s%> bent. <S%H4571><s%>
Pour out <S%H8210><s%> your indignation <S%H2195><s%> on them. <S%H2740><s%> Let the fierceness of your anger <S%H639><s%> overtake them. <S%H5381><s%>
Let their habitation <S%H2918><s%> be desolate. <S%H8074><s%> Let no one dwell <S%H3427><s%> in their tents. <S%H168><s%>
For they persecute <S%H7291><s%> him whom you have wounded. <S%H5221><s%> They tell <S%H5608><s%> of the sorrow <S%H4341><s%> of those whom you have hurt. <S%H2491><s%>
Charge <S%H5414><s%> them with crime <S%H5771><s%> upon crime. <S%H5771><s%> Don't <S%H935><s%> let them come into your righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>
Let them be blotted <S%H4229><s%> out of the book <S%H5612><s%> of life, <S%H2416><s%> and not be written <S%H3789><s%> with the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>
But I am in pain <S%H6041><s%> and distress. <S%H3510><s%> Let your salvation, <S%H3444><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> protect me. <S%H7682><s%>
I will praise <S%H1984><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> with a song, <S%H7892><s%> and will magnify <S%H1431><s%> him with thanksgiving. <S%H8426><s%>
It will please <S%H3190><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> better <S%H3190><s%> than an ox, <S%H7794><s%> or a bull <S%H7794><s%> that has horns <S%H7160><s%> and hoofs. <S%H6536><s%>
The humble <S%H6035><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H8055><s%> and are glad. You who seek <S%H1875><s%> after God, <S%H430><s%> let your heart <S%H3824><s%> live. <S%H2421><s%>
For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> hears <S%H8085><s%> the needy, <S%H34><s%> and doesn't <S%H959><s%> despise his captive people. <S%H615><s%>
Let heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> praise <S%H1984><s%> him; <S%H3220><s%> the seas, and everything that moves therein! <S%H7430><s%>
For God <S%H430><s%> will save <S%H3467><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and build <S%H1129><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%> They shall settle there, and own it.
The children <S%H2233><s%> also of his servants <S%H5650><s%> shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> it. <S%H157><s%> Those who love his name <S%H8034><s%> shall dwell therein. <S%H7931><s%>
